name: MoteESN
paper: Mote-Based Online Anomaly Detection Using Echo State Networks
description: Echo State Network (ESN),directly on resource-constrained sensor motes (e.g., TelosB) for real-time anomaly detection. It unifies fault and event detection under a general anomaly-detection framework, allowing motes to distinguish between true measurement faults and meaningful environmental events.
